resources.string: Loren Ipsum data times thirty five is a lot of data. The very beginning of this loren ipsum data is to make users feel free wihle selecting random text.The past of loren ipsum goes back to the mayan age where calenders were the randomness of the day.
Apple launched the Apple Developer University Program,as a free initiative to assist higher education institutions,who intend to teach development for the iPhone,iPad and iPod Touch.

This program,available to accredited institutions in the U.S and abroad,allows teachers to create developer teams of up to 200 students who can develop,test,debug and distribute applications via the App Store giving them complete access to developer tools,including iPhone SDK and iPhone Dev Centre resources.
